ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description:
The mprod package provides python implementation for applying tensor-tensor (tubal) products.
In addition, tensor decompositions such as tQRM and tSVDM are provided, together
with tools for conducting multi-way data analysis such as TCAM.
about.summary: Software implementation for tensor-tensor m-product framework

about.description:
The mprod package provides python implementation for applying tensor-tensor (tubal) products.
In addition, tensor decompositions such as tQRM and tSVDM are provided, together
with tools for conducting multi-way data analysis such as TCAM.
about.summary: Software implementation for tensor-tensor m-product framework

name: mprod-package
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "mprod-package" %}
{% set version = "0.0.5a1" %}
{% set sha256 = "a5b791bb4337aa749a9bac3a7969e2878bbcc5f4cfd8636ce755f1e99ff49578" %}


package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/mprod-package-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install --no-deps --ignore-installed . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
  run:
    - dataclasses >=0.7
    - numpy >=1.19.2
    - pandas >=1.1.5
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - scikit-learn >=0.24.1
    - scipy >=1.5.3

test:
  imports:
    - mprod
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://github.com/UriaMorP/mprod_package
  summary: Software implementation for tensor-tensor m-product framework
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  description: |
    The mprod package provides python implementation for applying tensor-tensor (tubal) products.
    In addition, tensor decompositions such as tQRM and tSVDM are provided, together
    with tools for conducting multi-way data analysis such as TCAM. 

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - UriaMorP
